description: Value of the name of n as a Roman number, keeping only relevant letters, zero if none (v=u). French version.
references: R. Goscinny and A. Uderzo, Les Aventures d'Asterix le Gaulois, Editions Dargaud et Albert Ren'e.
formula: Decimal equivalent of v, vx, i, v, ci, ix, 0, vi, v, dix, 0, dv, i, v, ...
